You can play it with your friends inside a distributed network so that everyone can use its own phone. Game Rules Description of first feature. What makes the app privacy-friendly? Privacy Friendly Werewolf is built to use as less permissions as possible. It further does not include any tracking mechanisms or advertisement. Which permissions requires the app? Privacy Friendly Werewolf requires the permission to setup an wifi connection It is only used to search nearby devices and to start a communication channel with them. It does not connect to the internet in any way.
